description: A module that has been registered in the CloudFormation registry.

ModuleName.description:
The name of the module being registered.

Recommended module naming pattern: company_or_organization::service::type::MODULE.
ModuleName.markdownDescription:
The name of the module being registered.

Recommended module naming pattern: company_or_organization::service::type::MODULE.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::MODULE  
Update requires: Replacement

ModulePackage.description: The url to the S3 bucket containing the schema and template fragment for the module you want to register.
ModulePackage.markdownDescription:
The url to the S3 bucket containing the schema and template fragment for the module you want to register.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/module/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: The description of the registered module.
Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the registered module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentationUrl.description: The URL of a page providing detailed documentation for this module.
DocumentationUrl.markdownDescription:
The URL of a page providing detailed documentation for this module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Update requires: No interruption

IsDefaultVersion.description: Indicator of whether this module version is the current default version
IsDefaultVersion.markdownDescription:
Indicator of whether this module version is the current default version

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Schema.description: The schema defining input parameters to and resources generated by the module.
Schema.markdownDescription:
The schema defining input parameters to and resources generated by the module.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 16777216  
Update requires: No interruption

TimeCreated.description: The time that the specified module version was registered.
TimeCreated.markdownDescription:
The time that the specified module version was registered.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VersionId.description: The version ID of the module represented by this module instance.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
The version ID of the module represented by this module instance.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9]{8}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Visibility.description:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

The only allowed value at present is:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.
Visibility.markdownDescription:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

The only allowed value at present is:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRIVATE  
Update requires: No interruption
